data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: There is an old wives' tale that dried beans must be soaked in water without salt, or they will never soften. This ____ out ____ be ____. Soaking ____ beans ____ salted ____ can ____ improve ____ flavor, and ____ not ____ at ____ cost ____ texture ____ cooking ____. And while unsalted beans may absorb more water, they are more likely to burst while cooking, negatively impacting the texture of the cooked bean.
data.partBlankContent: There is an old wives' tale that dried beans must be soaked in water without salt, or they will never soften. This tu___ out t_ be unt___. Soaking t__ beans i_ salted wa___ can signif_______ improve th___ flavor, and wi__ not co__ at t__ cost o_ texture o_ cooking ti__. And while unsalted beans may absorb more water, they are more likely to burst while cooking, negatively impacting the texture of the cooked bean.
data.answer: 有一个古老的传说，晒干的豆子必须用不加盐的水浸泡，否则它们永远不会变软。事实证明这是不正确的。将豆类浸泡在盐水中，可显著改善其风味，且不会因烹饪时间而影响口感。虽然不加盐的豆子可能会吸收更多的水分，但它们在烹饪时更容易破裂，对煮熟的豆子的质地产生负面影响。
